title: How to set dynamic id(*ngFor) in ionic2/angular2?
body:
<div class = "CirclePoint" *ngFor="let c of circles" 
    [attr.id]="'Location' + c.id">
</div>

<div class = "CirclePoint" *ngFor="let c of circles" 
    attr.id="Location{{c.id}}">
</div>

For the id attribute this might work as well (not tried myself yet) 

<div class = "CirclePoint" *ngFor="let c of circles" 
[id]="'Location' + c.id">
</div>
